title: WebdriverIO Target
description: WebdriverIO target option for Build Facade

devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against.

user.description: username if using a cloud service as automation backend

key.description: corresponding access key to the user

bail.description: stop test runner after specific amount of tests have failed

baseUrl.description: shorten url command calls by setting a base url

framework.description: defines the framework (Mocha, Jasmine or Cucumber) to run the specs

reporters.description: reporters to print out the results on stdout

suite.description: overwrites the specs attribute and runs the defined suite

spec.description: run only a certain spec file - overrides specs piped from stdin

exclude.description: exclude certain spec file from the test run - overrides exclude piped from stdin
